ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: True.  Of course the simpliest way to avoid faction hits in PoG is to NOT HUNT THERE :)  As Rokenn follows Tunare he certainly will not be, and shame on you
ygData.messageBody:
True. Of course the simpliest way to avoid faction hits in PoG is to NOT
HUNT THERE :) As Rokenn follows Tunare he certainly will not be, and shame
on you wood elves that go there to kill your godess' creations. What are
you Teir'dal or something? haha

- KILL em all now :) Let em sort it out later.

Tho Tunare may be my creator she is NOT my god. I follow Quellious :) I
blame it ALL on the quest for knowledge. I WANT to know what Tunare looks
like dead. I want to know what Phat Lewtz she drops :)

God! I am evil >:)

Besides :) so you get Kos in parts of Kelethin and Felwith. More zones to
hunt in!

Give me enough time and I can justify all my actions!

Jacana Mourningsong
Wood Elf Minstrel
<The Pantheon> Innoruuk
